pageSetting.title: 已认领子页面汇总

select.isEqual: select jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,sum(rlhs) rlhs,sum(rlclye) rlclye,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(sum(rlclye)/sum(zhye)*100,2) end rlcljezb,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh from( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,round(gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlhs,round(zh.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,1 rlhs,zh.zhye rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=zh.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a group by jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh order by jgdh,lbmc asc,rlclye desc

select jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,sum(rlhs) rlhs,sum(rlclye) rlclye,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(sum(rlclye)/sum(zhye)*100,2)end rlcljezb,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh from( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,round(gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlhs,round(zh.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,1 rlhs,zh.zhye rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=zh.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a group by jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh order by jgdh,lbmc asc,rlclye desc

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,sum(rlhs) rlhs,sum(rlclye) rlclye,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(sum(rlclye)/sum(zhye)*100,2) end rlcljezb,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh from( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,round(gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlhs,round(zh.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_ck gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,1 rlhs,zh.zhye rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_ckzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=zh.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a group by jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh order by jgdh,lbmc asc,rlclye desc
select jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,sum(rlhs) rlhs,sum(rlclye) rlclye,case when sum(zhye)=0 then 0 else round(sum(rlclye)/sum(zhye)*100,2)end rlcljezb,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh from( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,round(gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlhs,round(zh.zhye*gx.zlbl*0.01,2) rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join dxgx_hyyjgx_dk gx on zh.jxdxdh=gx.jxdxdh and gx.jsrq=29991231 inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on hy.khdxdh=gx.khdxdh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh where zh.gxhslx='1' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' union all select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,hy.hydh,hy.hymc,hylb.lbmc,1 rlhs,zh.zhye rlclye,zh.zhye ,'$zhbs$' zhbs,$khrq$ khrq,$tjrq$ tjrq,$jgkhdxdh$ khdxdh from jxdx_dkzh zh inner join khdx_jg jg on zh.jgdh=jg.jgdh inner join khdx_hylb hylb on hylb.khdxdh=zh.khdxdh and $tjrq$ between hylb.qsrq and hylb.jsrq inner join khdx_hy hy on zh.khdxdh=hy.khdxdh where zh.gxhslx='0' and hy.hydh not like 'XN%' and zh.khrq between $khrq$ and $tjrq$ and jg.khdxdh =$jgkhdxdh$ and zh.zhbs='$zhbs$' ) a group by jgdh,jgmc,hydh,hymc,lbmc,zhbs,khrq,tjrq,khdxdh order by jgdh,lbmc asc,rlclye desc ) t
